name: Hanes mens Underwear Boxers Pack, Cool and Breathable Cotton Underwear, Exposed and Comfortflex Waistbands, Multi-pack
product_description: Think of everything you love about your softest tee and imagine how that would feel in ultra-comfortable cotton knit boxers. Here they are from Hanes® with comfort in every detail. Soft and breathable, these basic knit boxers are made from Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks moisture away from your skin to keep you cool and dry all day. These cotton boxers enhance comfort further with the ComfortFlex® stretch logo waistband that moves with you and keeps its shape wash after wash without pinching or binding. Another detail of comfort designed into Hanes® T-shirt-soft knit underwear is the tagless styling which means no annoying tag to bunch up or itch. You'll also appreciate the button fly that stays smooth and the convenience of a 5-pack for stock-up ease.

name: Calvin Klein Men's Underwear Cotton Classics 5-Pack Boxer Brief
product_description: The Calvin Klein original. First introduced in 1981, this is our most iconic men’s underwear style. Designed with the original Calvin Klein logo waistband, this timeless boxer brief is made from pure cotton for breathable comfort.

name: Hanes mens Stay Dry Pouch Boxer Briefs, Performance Stretch Boxer Brief With Leak Protection, 3-pack
product_description: Hanes Stay Dry Pouch men’s boxer briefs may look and feel like regular underwear, but there is nothing ordinary about boxer briefs engineered to boost your confidence. A thin, absorbent front panel discreetly blocks unexpected dribbles and drips to keep you (and your pants) feeling dry. And the best part? Crafted from lightweight and quick-drying performance stretch fabric, this men’s underwear is packed with all the features you expect from Hanes: A soft and stretchy waistband with a smooth, Tagless® interior. No-ride-up fit. Moisture-wicking, cooling, and odor protection technologies. Perfect for the gym, the office, or on the go, this far-from-ordinary boxer brief may be the confidence solution you’ve been looking for. The Hanes Stay Dry Pouch - Comfortable Protection To Keep You Dry.
